summary: Minimum Absorb Health, Fire Damage, Frost Damage, Shock Damage, Paralysis, Soul Trap.
descriptionHtml:
Find one near the outdoor Zenithar shrine, and one by the skeletal hand at the end of the halted stream.

Don\'t worry about it being over-powered, cause each damage is only 8, and it\'s based off a vanilla katana.  Any mods that adjust or change the vanilla katana will change this one too.
author: MetricJester
